___incomeTax.description: This object gives a breakdown of the income tax calculation. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

___totalIncomeTax.description: The total calculated Income Tax after allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalIncomeTax.title: Total Income Tax

___totalAfterGiftAid.description: The total Income Tax after Gift Aid. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalAfterGiftAid.title: Total After Gift Aid

___totalBeforeReliefs.description: The total Income Tax before allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalBeforeReliefs.title: Total Before Reliefs

___taxableIncome.description: The total income subject to Income Tax calculation. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income

___allowancesAndReliefs.description: This object details the allowances and reliefs used in the income tax calculation

___totalAllowancesAndReliefs.description: The total amount of allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalAllowancesAndReliefs.title: Total Allowances And Reliefs

___propertyFinanceRelief.description: The relief against property finance costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___propertyFinanceRelief.title: Property Finance Relief

___totalAfterReliefs.description: The total Income Tax after allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalAfterReliefs.title: Total After Reliefs

___giftAid.description: This object shows the amount of Income tax associated to the amount of Gift Aid being declared. The actual Gift Aid benefit itself is reflected as a rate band extension (see annualAllowances.giftAidExtender).

___paymentsMade.description: The total amount of Gift Aid payments made for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___paymentsMade.title: Payments Made

___rate.description: The basic rate of tax that applies to Gift Aid. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.
___rate.title: Rate

___taxableAmount.description: The taxable amount of the Gift Aid payments made. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableAmount.title: Taxable Amount

___dividends.description: This object gives a breakdown of the income tax calculation in relation to dividends

___band.description: The banding array shows the tax banding applicable to an Income Tax category. Only bands applicable to the calculation will be generated (for example a BRT taxpayer will not have bands for HRT and ART). There will always be a minimum of 1 band if the array exists. The array will be populated in ascending order of the tax bands.

oneOf.description: dividend allowance awarded at basic rate
dividend allowance awarded at higher rate
dividend allowance awarded at additional rate

___name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of the following: BRT, HRT, ART, ZRTBR, ZRTHR, ZRTAR
___name.title: Name

___threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___threshold.title: Threshold

___rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.
___rate.title: Rate

___bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___bandLimit.title: Band Limit

___income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___income.title: Income

___amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___amount.title: Amount

___apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold

___apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___apportionedBandLimit.title: Apportioned Band Limit

___personalAllowanceUsed.description: The amount of the apportioned annual personal allowance that has been offset against dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___personalAllowanceUsed.title: Personal Allowance Used

___taxableIncome.description: The taxable income associated with dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income

___totalAmount.description: The total amount of Income Tax associated with dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalAmount.title: Total Amount

___savingsAndGains.description: This object gives a breakdown of the income tax calculation in relation to savings and gains.

___band.description: The banding array shows the tax banding applicable to an Income Tax category. Only bands applicable to the calculation will be generated. (e.g a BRT taxpayer will not have bands for HRT and ART). There will always be a minimum of 1 band if the array exists. The array will be populated in ascending order of the tax bands.

oneOf.description: personal savings allowance awarded at basic rate
personal savings allowance awarded at higher rate

___name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of the following: SSR,BRT,HRT,ART, ZRTBR, ZRTHR
___name.title: Name

___threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___threshold.title: Threshold

___rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___rate.title: Rate

___bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___bandLimit.title: Band Limit

___income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___income.title: Income

___amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___amount.title: Amount

___apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold

___apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___apportionedBandLimit.title: Apportioned Band Limit

___personalAllowanceUsed.description: The amount of the apportioned annual personal allowance that has been offset against savings and gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___personalAllowanceUsed.title: Personal Allowance Used

___taxableIncome.description: The taxable income associated with savings and gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income

___totalAmount.description: The total amount of Income Tax associated with savings and gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalAmount.title: Total Amount

___residentialFinanceCosts.description: This object gives a breakdown of the income tax calculation in relation to residential finance costs

___rate.description: The tax rate used for the calculation. The value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___rate.title: Rate

___allowableAmount.description: The lower of: finance costs not deducted, property business profits, adjusted total income (exceeding Personal Allowance)
___allowableAmount.title: Allowable Amount

___amountClaimed.description: The amount being claimed including any carry forward amounts
___amountClaimed.title: Amount Claimed

___payAndPensionsProfit.description: This object gives a breakdown of the income tax calculation in relation to pay, pensions and profit.

___band.description: The banding array shows the tax bands applicable to an Income Tax category. Only bands applicable to the calculation will be generated. (e.g. a BRT taxpayer will not have bands for HRT and ART). There will always be a minimum of 1 band if the array exists. The array will be populated in ascending order of the tax bands.

___name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of: SRT, BRT, IRT, HRT, ART
___name.title: Name

___threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___threshold.title: Threshold

___rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places
___rate.title: Rate

___bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___bandLimit.title: Band Limit

___income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___income.title: Income

___amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___amount.title: Amount

___apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold

___apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___apportionedBandLimit.title: Apportioned Band Limit

___personalAllowanceUsed.description: The amount of the apportioned annual personal allowance that has been offset against pay and pensions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___personalAllowanceUsed.title: Personal Allowance Used

___taxableIncome.description: The taxable income associated with pay and pensions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income

___totalAmount.description: The total amount of income tax associated with pay and pensions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalAmount.title: Total Amount

___year.description: The ending year of the tax year to which the calculation relates, in the format YYYY. For example, tax year 2016 to 2017 is expressed as 2017. Value must be between 2016 and 2999.
___year.title: Year

___taxDeducted.description: This object details the tax deductions that apply to the calculation. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

___savings.description: Tax deducted from interest received from UK banks and building societies. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___savings.title: Savings

___ukLandAndProperty.description: Tax that has been deducted for UK land and property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___ukLandAndProperty.title: UK Land And Property

___totalTaxDeducted.description: The total amount of Income Tax and National Insurance that has been deducted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalTaxDeducted.title: Total Tax Deducted

___annualAllowances.description: This object defines the annual allowances used in the calculation. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

___personalAllowance.description: The annual amount of personal allowance available for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___personalAllowance.title: Personal Allowance

___personalAllowanceThreshold.description: The threshold at which the annual personal allowance is reduced. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___personalAllowanceThreshold.title: Personal Allowance Threshold

___reducedPersonalAllowance.description: The annual amount that the personal allowance is reduced to, if the income exceeds the personalAllowanceThreshold amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___reducedPersonalAllowance.title: Reduced Personal Allowance

___giftAidExtender.description: The amount by which the rate band thresholds are extended as a result of Gift Aid claimed against this tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___giftAidExtender.title: Gift Aid Extender

___validationMessageCount.description: The quantity of validation messages encountered during the calculation.
___validationMessageCount.title: Validation Message Count

___taxableIncome.description: This object analyses how taxable income is derived. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

___savings.description: This object summarises interest from UK banks, building societies and securities
___savings.title: Savings

___totalIncome.description: The taxable amount of interest from UK banks, building societies and securities. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalIncome.title: Total Income

___untaxedAccounts.description: An array of savings accounts where no tax has been deducted
___untaxedAccounts.title: Untaxed Accounts

___name.description: Friendly account name. The account name must be between 1 and 32 characters in length. Allowed characters, including spaces are: mixed case alphanumeric characters and the characters; &'()*,-./@£
___name.title: Name

___savingsAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the savings account
___savingsAccountId.title: Savings Account ID

___gross.description: The gross interest for the savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___gross.title: Gross

___taxedAccounts.description: An array of savings accounts where interest has had tax deducted
___taxedAccounts.title: Taxed Accounts

___name.description: Friendly account name. The account name must be between 1 and 32 characters in length. Allowed characters, including spaces are: mixed case alphanumeric characters and the characters; &'()*,-./@£
___name.title: Name

___taxDeducted.description: The tax deducted from the savings account (gross minus net). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxDeducted.title: Tax Deducted

___savingsAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the savings account
___savingsAccountId.title: Savings Account ID

___gross.description: The gross interest for the savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___gross.title: Gross

___net.description: The net interest for the savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___net.title: Net

___totalUntaxedInterestIncome.description: Total interest from all untaxed savings accounts. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalUntaxedInterestIncome.title: Total Untaxed Interest Income

___totalTaxedInterestIncome.description: Total gross interest from all taxed savings accounts. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalTaxedInterestIncome.title: Total Taxed Interest Income

___totalIncomeReceived.description: The total income received for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalIncomeReceived.title: Total Income Received

___ukProperty.description: This object summarises the UK property income sources

___nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsTaxablePro.description: Taxable profit from UK non-furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsTaxablePro.title: Non-Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Profit

___finalised.description: Shows whether the UK property income has been finalised.
___finalised.title: Finalised

___nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.description: Loss from UK non-furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.title: Non-Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Loss

___furnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.description: Loss from UK furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___furnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.title: Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Loss

___totalIncome.description: The total income from all UK property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalIncome.title: Total Income

___furnishedHolidayLettingsTaxableProfit.description: Taxable profit from UK furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___furnishedHolidayLettingsTaxableProfit.title: Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Profit

___ukDividends.description: This object summarises the UK dividends income

___totalIncome.description: The total income from all UK dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalIncome.title: Total Income

___ukDividends.description: The total dividend payments received from UK companies. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___ukDividends.title: UK Dividends

___otherUkDividends.description: The total dividend payments received from other UK dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___otherUkDividends.title: Other UK Dividends

___selfEmployments.description: This object summarises income for all self-employment sources

___selfEmployment.description: Provides the taxable income for each individual self-employment

___finalised.description: Shows whether this self-employment income has been finalised.
___finalised.title: Finalised

___losses.description: Any loss from this self-employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___losses.title: Losses

___taxableIncome.description: The taxable income from this self-employment business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income

___selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer.
___selfEmploymentId.title: Self-Employment ID

___totalIncome.description: The total income from all self-employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalIncome.title: Total Income

___totalTaxableIncome.description: The total taxable income (income less allowances and deductions). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalTaxableIncome.title: Total Taxable Income

___allowancesAndDeductions.description: This object summarises the allowances and adjustments for the Tax Year

___totalAllowancesAndDeductions.description: The total of all allowances and deductions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalAllowancesAndDeductions.title: Total Allowances And Deductions

___apportionedPersonalAllowance.description: The amount of the annual personal allowance that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___apportionedPersonalAllowance.title: Apportioned Personal Allowance

___giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.description: Investments and/or property gifts made to charity. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.title: Gift Of Investments And Property To Charity

___totalBenefitsAndExpenses.description: The total benefits and expenses from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalBenefitsAndExpenses.title: Total Benefits And Expenses

___totalIncome.description: The total income from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalIncome.title: Total Income

___totalPay.description: The total net pay from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalPay.title: Total Pay

___allowableExpenses.description: The allowable expenses relating to this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___allowableExpenses.title: Allowable Expenses

___netPay.description: The year-to-date net pay for this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___netPay.title: Net Pay

___benefitsAndExpenses.description: The benefits and expenses relating to this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___benefitsAndExpenses.title: Benefits And Expenses

___totalAllowableExpenses.description: The total allowable expenses from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalAllowableExpenses.title: Total Allowable Expenses

___nic.description: This object defines the National Insurance Contributions involved in the calculation. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

___totalNic.description: The calculated amount of National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalNic.title: Total NIC

___class2.description: This object defines the Class 2 NIC elements of the calculation

___limit.description: The annual limit of Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___limit.title: Limit

___apportionedLimit.description: The apportioned amount of annual Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___apportionedLimit.title: Apportioned Limit

___amount.description: The calculated amount of Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___amount.title: Amount

___weeks.description: The number of weeks applied to calculate Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value is a whole number in the range 0 to 52.
___weeks.title: Weeks

___weekRate.description: The weekly rate for Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___weekRate.title: Week Rate

___class4.description: This object defines the Class 4 NIC elements of the calculation

___band.description: The banding array shows the banding applicable to NIC Class 4. Only bands applicable to the calculation will be generated. There will always be a minimum of 1 band if the array exists.

___name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of: BRT, HRT, ZRT
___name.title: Name

___threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___threshold.title: Threshold

___rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.
___rate.title: Rate

___income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___income.title: Income

___amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___amount.title: Amount

___apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
___apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold

___totalAmount.description: The calculated amount of Class 4 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalAmount.title: Total Amount

___nationalRegime.description: Defines which national tax rates and rules to apply to the calculation. Must be one of: UK, Scotland, Wales. This field will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.
___nationalRegime.title: National Regime

___intentToCrystallise.description: Shows if this calculation is provided with the intent to crystallise. The default is FALSE
___intentToCrystallise.title: Intent To Crystallise

___crystallised.description: Shows if the calculation has been performed on the crystallised position. The default is FALSE
___crystallised.title: Crystallised

___totalBeforeTaxDeducted.description: The subtotal of Income Tax and National Insurance before tax is deducted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalBeforeTaxDeducted.title: Total Before Tax Deducted

___eoyEstimate.description: This object details the End of Year estimate for Income Tax. It will only be populated for in-year calculations; it will not be populated as part of a crystallisation calculation. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

___nic4.description: The estimated amount of Class 4 National Insurance contributions, net of deductions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___nic4.title: NIC 4

___savings.description: An array of annualised estimated income  from UK banks, building societies and securities

___savingsAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the savings account
___savingsAccountId.title: Savings Account ID

___taxableIncome.description: The estimated annual income from UK banks, building societies and securities. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income

___supplied.description: Shows whether the interest from UK banks, building societies and securities has been supplied or calculated.  If true, the amount has been supplied. If false, the amount has been calculated
___supplied.title: Supplied

___nic2.description: The estimated amount of Class 2 National Insurance contributions, net of deductions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___nic2.title: NIC 2

___ukProperty.description: An object of annualised estimated income for a UK property business

___finalised.description: Shows whether the UK property income has been finalised.
___finalised.title: Finalised

___taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from UK property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income

___supplied.description: Shows whether the UK property income has been supplied or calculated. If true, UK property income has been supplied. If false, the UK property income has been calculated.
___supplied.title: Supplied

___ukDividends.description: An object of annualised estimated income for UK dividends

___finalised.description: Shows whether the UK dividend income has been finalised.
___finalised.title: Finalised

___taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from UK dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income

___supplied.description: Shows whether the UK dividend income has been supplied or calculated. If true, UK dividend income has been supplied. If false, the UK dividend income has been calculated.
___supplied.title: Supplied

___selfEmployments.description: An array of annualised estimated income for each self employment business

___finalised.description: Shows whether this self-employment income has been finalised.
___finalised.title: Finalised

___taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from this self-employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income

___supplied.description: Shows whether this self-employment income has been supplied or calculated. If true, the self-employment income has been supplied. If false, the self-employment income has been calculated.
___supplied.title: Supplied

___selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer.
___selfEmploymentId.title: Self-Employment ID

___incomeTaxNicAmount.description: The total estimated amount of Income Tax and National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___incomeTaxNicAmount.title: Income Tax And NIC Amount

___totalTaxableIncome.description: The total estimated taxable income from all income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalTaxableIncome.title: Total Taxable Income

___incomeTaxAmount.description: The estimated amount of Income Tax. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___incomeTaxAmount.title: Income Tax Amount

___totalNicAmount.description: The total estimated amount of National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___totalNicAmount.title: Total NIC Amount

___employments.description: An array of annualised estimated income for each employment

___finalised.description: Shows whether the employment income has been finalised.
___finalised.title: Finalised

___taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
___taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income

___supplied.description: Shows whether the employment income has been supplied or calculated. If true, the employment income has been supplied. If false, the employment income has been calculated.
___supplied.title: Supplied

___calculationMessageCount.description: The quantity of warning/information messages for the calculation.
___calculationMessageCount.title: Calculation Message Count

___calculationMessages.description: An array of messages to provide additional context to the calculation

___type.description: The message type. Must be one of: warning information
___type.title: Type

___incomeTaxAndNicYTD.description: The Income Tax and National Insurance contributions due, based on year-to-date figures. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places. This field will not be displayed if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation
___incomeTaxAndNicYTD.title: Income Tax And Nic YTD
